common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_01:
I remember your olive-rolling prowess very
well, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_02:
You had such vigor—it was almost as if you had
Terastallized into a Fighting type yourself![VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_03:
How many Gyms had you been to when you first
came here to mine? Was it your first?[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_04:
The Cortondo Gym is close to the academy, so
many young Trainers just starting out like to come\r
here first.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_05:
With that in mind, La Primera asks me to go soft
on Trainers—like a nice sponge cake.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_06:
I feel sad for my sweet little bugs, though, since
that means they quite often lose their battles.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_07:
Hehe. But opportunities like this get me excited
because I can finally show my true skill.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_08: Allow me to knead you into submission![VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_09:
That was quite the battle. I must say that your
skill rivals that of even La Primera.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_10:
Ah! How sweet it is to battle without holding
back—even if I end up losing![VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_11:
I am beginning to think that going too soft on
people may be no good for either party.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_12:
My culinary teacher, Mr. Kofu, did tell me to put
more of myself into my baking, after all.[VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_13:
I think I may try conducting battles in more of my
own style from now on![VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_14:
If Trainers complain that the Cortondo Gym is
suddenly more difficult, I’ll just tell them that\r
not all pastries are sweet![VAR 0114(0016)]
common_2020_mushi_020_mushi_15:
Good-bye for now. I hope to see you again
someday![VAR 0114(0016)]
